text: Mikhail Sergeyevich Kuzmich (, born October 8, 1982 in Krasnoyarsk) is a Russian luger who has competed since 1999. Competing in three Winter Olympics, he earned his best finish of 11th in the men's doubles event at Turin in 2006. Kuzmich's best finish at the FIL World Luge Championships was eighth in the men's doubles event at Oberhof in 2008. His best finish at the FIL European Luge Championships was sixth in the men's doubles event at Sigulda in 2010. ==References== * 2002 luge men's doubles results * 2006 luge men's doubles results * CBS Sportsline.com profile * FIL-Luge profile (as Michail Kuzmich) * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Lugers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Lugers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Lugers at the 2010 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic lugers of Russia Category:Sportspeople from Krasnoyarsk Category:Russian male lugers
title: Mikhail Kuzmich
